verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Hallelujah, hallelujah, for the Lord God almighty reigns (x2)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Holy, holy, Are You Lord God almighty
Worthy is the Lamb, Worthy is the Lamb

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
You are
Holy, holy, Are You Lord God almighty
Worthy is the Lamb, Worthy is the Lamb
Amen
